name: Ball Run Demo #2
description:
Now you can create fun with Ball Run!

Controls (Control list not available in game (yet))

WASD - Camera control

QE / Scroll Wheel - Camera Zoom / Object rotation

Right Click/ESC - Cancel

Space - Start Simulation

Tab - Grid Rotate / Snap

Left Alt + Mouse - Resize Object

Backspace - Delete Last Object

Duplicate Object Placement / Action (Pinball Paddle) - Shift

Flip Object - F
